tweet: It's finally here! Introducing IOTA Chronicle, our Permanode Solution. Node owners can now easily store all #IOTA transactions in a fast, secure, scalable and distributed database. Learn more about this new #permanode solution here:  https://t.co/EYQzXZ7dk9 #scylladb

IOTA is now available at #Zeux App. You can use #IOTA tokens as payment at all stores that accept Apple or Samsung Pay. Read about the launch:  https://t.co/gmUDiYb7Ti @ZeuxApp #paytech #fintech  https://t.co/zXgomnyhvD

We've just released the official #IOTA permanode solution - Chronicle. This solves many of the requests we've had from community and corporate partners to have a scalable and fast storage solution for the entire history. One building block at a time towards production-readiness.

To clarify the upcoming launch of the Ict-powered network:  1. New iotas won't be created. 2. #Ict operators will be paid with iotas from the existing mainnet powered by IRI. 3. The payments will be done by game operators who will have to buy iotas on the market.  #Paracosm #IOTA
#IOTA is now officially on the #Zeux app. Thank you all for your patience. @iotatoken
A big part of the puzzle just came out today. #IOTA’s Permanode solution, #Chronicle!

#EDAG is hosting the world premiere of the #CityBot concept car – a fully autonomous, networked robot vehicle which, with its numerous trailer & rucksack modules, is capable of handling any transport & work situations in urban areas, & is also in motion 24/7. #IOTA #IAA19  https://t.co/vOTs7kiXUS
We see a big gap between #IOTA’s amazing potential and what it can actually do today. #Coordicide will unlock that potential. The main question is: will it come on time?    https://t.co/s3MAvvTwQ1

#IOTA permanode solution, named Chronicle is another gigantic leap forward. The #Tangle would be able to stay lean mean "prunable," light ledger, while everyone who needs to keep the records would have the Chronicle. Phenomenal progress, truly phenomenal!  https://t.co/o5gcic8aFH
In recent weeks, much is talked about climate and environmental protection. Remember, in this context, our medium article from June 2019: "#IOTA a sustainable cryptocurrency"  https://t.co/jLa63w33gr

#Dekaton embodies the next ERP generation, natively integrating #IOTA (DLT), Grakn (GDB), #AI and #MachineLearning. It combines the encryption and security of #DistributedLedgerTechnologies (#DLT), with the speed and flexibility of a Graph Database (GDB), an intelligent database.
